text: Martine Wiltshire, MBE (first named Wright; born 30 September 1972) is a British sitting volleyball player. Wright was born in London. She lost both her legs because of injuries from an explosion during the 7/7 London bombings in 2005. == References == Category:Living people Category:1972 births Category:Sportspeople from London Category:Members of the Order of the British Empire Category:Sitting volleyball players Category:British sportspeople with disabilities
title: Martine Wright
